DOC.brief_title: Lenalidomide , Dexamethasone MEDI-551 Untreated Multiple Myeloma
DOC.detailed_description: To explore effect Lenalidomide , dexamethasone Medi-551 multiple myeloma cancer stem cell ( CSCs ) . Myeloma CSCs assess clonogenic assay bone marrow flow cytometry peripheral blood .
